Name: 3D PUZZLE - Farm House
About the game: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful house. The player can carry items by taking them with the left mouse button and automatically place them if he brought them to the right place. Move the player on the WASD keys You need to go to the item, take it by pressing the left mouse button and take the item to the desired location marked in green. If you brought the correct item, it will snap into place and you will receive leaderboard points and achievements for this. Collect as much substance as possible as quickly as possible to get more points for the leaderboard. If you brought the wrong item, you can throw it away, it will return to the starting location so that you can pick it up again.
